name: Carousel.Root
description: A slideshow component that cycles through elements.
description_zh: A slideshow component that cycles through elements.

align.description: The alignment of the slides in the carousel.
align.description_zh: 轮播中幻灯片的对齐方式。

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultIndex.description:
The initial index of the carousel when it is first rendered.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the carousel.
defaultIndex.description_zh:
首次呈现轮播时轮播的初始索引。
当您不需要控制轮播的状态时，请使用此选项。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  viewport: string
  item(index: number): string
  itemGroup: string
  nextTrigger: string
  prevTrigger: string
  indicatorGroup: string
  indicator(index: number): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the carousel. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 轮播中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

loop.description: Whether the carousel should loop around.

slidesPerView.description: The number of slides to show at a time.
slidesPerView.description_zh: 一次要显示的幻灯片数。

spacing.description: The amount of space between slides.

events.name: indexChange
events.description: Function called when the slide changes.
events.description_zh: 幻灯片更改时调用的函数。
